response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. Considering its unparalleled quality and significance, we propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the value for you. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further details about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
